REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A f1618 reute r f BC-J-AND-J-SNACK-<JJSF> 03-19 0052

TEXT.TITLE: J AND J SNACK <JJSF> TO SELL CONVERTIBLE DEBT
TEXT.BODY: J and J Snack Foods Corp said it filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission a registration statement covering a 25 mln dlr issue of convertible debentures. The company said proceeds would be used for potential future acquisitions. Reuter
